data.title: South Koreans drink twice as much liquor as Russians and more than four times as much as Americans
Hackers Sue German Government Over NSA Spying
SMS from Swedish woman at centre of Assange case say police "made up the charges" against Assange.

WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange has claimed that a woman he is alleged to have raped sent text messages admitting that he never assaulted her | In an affidavit published on the WikiLeaks website, Assange cites several SMS messages supposedly exchanged between his two alleged victims.
Corruption in the EU is "breathtaking" says EU Commissioner.
Financial world shaken by 4 bankers' apparent suicides in a week
Chaos Computer Clubs files criminal complaint against entire German government and Merkel over spying scandal
The truth behind the luxury of Qatar Airways – Flight attendants treated like slaves
UK Parliament considers allowing secret courts to issue orders to seize reporters' notebooks

EU: Sweden should ban secret party donations -- While Sweden was acknowledged as one of the least corrupt countries in the EU, a new report from the European Commission urges Sweden to ban anonymous political party donations.
